feed.title: Activ8
feed.subtitle: The Activ8 platform is the result of a 3 year project between universities and companies in the EU dedicated to solve the pressing challenges in IoT (Internet of Things). The platform emphasizes open standards, in-built security, extensibility, REST principles and application development

entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
This is the first post from the Activ8 project. We hope to have much more information available soon.

Until then, hold tight
entry.summary: This is the first post from the Activ8 project. We hope to have much more information available soon.
